application.pane

Interface PaneReplacer

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    PaneAnimator, PaneReplacerShortened
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ContainsAnotherPane, JavaFXAppController, JavaFXAppHandler, OrderExecution, PaneAnimator.Handler, PrintAll, UserPane, ViewHoldings, ViewStocksGraphs

    public interface PaneReplacer
    This interface manages the loads of independent panes, by loading their .fxml files and their according Controllers.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      default javafx.scene.layout.Pane getPane(java.lang.String pathToFXML)
      The method gets a path to .fxml file and returns the according Pane to it.
      default void setPane(javafx.scene.layout.BorderPane borderPaneToShowOnItsCenter, javafx.scene.layout.Pane parentContainer, java.lang.String pathToFXML)
      This method sets the new Pane to be shown on a CENTER of the BorderPane and updates the Pane accordingly.
      default void setPane(javafx.scene.layout.BorderPane borderPaneToShowOnItsCenter, java.lang.String pathToFXML)
      This method is similar to setPane(BorderPane, Pane, String) but without updating the replaceAblePane and parentContainer's children.

    • Method Detail

      • getPane

        default javafx.scene.layout.Pane getPane(java.lang.String pathToFXML)
        The method gets a path to .fxml file and returns the according Pane to it.
        Parameters:
        pathToFXML - the path to the .fxml file the user wishes to load.
        Returns:
        the according Pane the user wishes to show to the screen.

      • setPane

        default void setPane(javafx.scene.layout.BorderPane borderPaneToShowOnItsCenter,
                     javafx.scene.layout.Pane parentContainer,
                     java.lang.String pathToFXML)
        This method sets the new Pane to be shown on a CENTER of the BorderPane and updates the Pane accordingly.
        Parameters:
        borderPaneToShowOnItsCenter - the BorderPane to show the Pane provided in the .fxml file.
        parentContainer - is a child of the provided BorderPane, and the Parent of the Pane that is being provided by the .fxml file.
        pathToFXML - path to the .fxml of the pane the user wishes to show.

      • setPane

        default void setPane(javafx.scene.layout.BorderPane borderPaneToShowOnItsCenter,
                     java.lang.String pathToFXML)
        This method is similar to setPane(BorderPane, Pane, String) but without updating the replaceAblePane and parentContainer's children.
        Parameters:
        borderPaneToShowOnItsCenter - the BorderPane to show the Pane provided in the .fxml file.
        pathToFXML - path to the .fxml of the pane the user wishes to show.
        See Also:
        setPane(BorderPane, Pane, String)
